While in [[Iburi Clan's Kekkei Genkai|smoke form]], an Iburi can enter a target through their nostrils and mouth. Once inside, every part of their body can be attacked from the inside by the smoke, causing great pain, and even death.

[[fr:Technique d'Oxydation du Corps]]
[[pl:Ibushimi no Jutsu]]
